TopicTitle: Get Saved Vessel List And put vessel directly in orbit from any screen

Articles.Content:
Hi, i'm writting a mission plugin and i'm looking for a KSP fonction that can give me every saved Ship in the game, i want be able to select one of these ship and get the ability to put it in orbit from any current screen ( editor , spacecenter ,etc ) without have to be in the launchpad.

i will be really thankfull for your help !
